titleStmt.title: Religions enemies. With a brief and ingenious relation, as by Anabaptists, Brownists, papists, Familists, Atheists and Foolists, sawcily presuming to tosse religion in a blanquet.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Thomas Bates in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
